title: 80 Days On, Why Sunita Williams Is Still In Space
content: In June 2024, when the Boeing Starliner spacecraft carried NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore to space, it was going to be a short eight-day mission. However, it's been 80 days since the launch and the two astronauts are yet to return.
summary: In June 2024, when the Boeing Starliner spacecraft carried NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore to space, it was going to be a short eight-day mission. However, it's been 80 days since the launch and the two astronauts are yet to return.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr Suspends US Presidential Campaign, Endorses Trump
content: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said on Friday he would suspend his campaign, and endorsed Republican Donald Trump.
summary: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said on Friday he would suspend his campaign, and endorsed Republican Donald Trump.

title: Starbucks In US' New Mexico Nicknamed "Charbucks" After 2 Arson Attacks
content: After two arson attacks at a Starbucks construction site in Taos, New Mexico, a developer is trying again to build the chain's first drive-through cafe in the mountain town with a history of revolts and opposition by some to national chains.
summary: After two arson attacks at a Starbucks construction site in Taos, New Mexico, a developer is trying again to build the chain's first drive-through cafe in the mountain town with a history of revolts and opposition by some to national chains.

title: Russia, Ukraine Swap 115 Prisoners Of War Each In UAE-Brokered Deal
content: Russia and Ukraine announced Saturday they had exchanged 115 prisoners of war each, just over two weeks after Kyiv launched a surprise incursion into Russia's Kursk region.
summary: Russia and Ukraine announced Saturday they had exchanged 115 prisoners of war each, just over two weeks after Kyiv launched a surprise incursion into Russia's Kursk region.

title: 3 Killed In Knife Attack During Street Festival In Germany
content: German police on Saturday stepped up a major hunt for a man who stabbed three people to death and wounded eight others at a street festival in the city of Solingen, authorities said.
summary: German police on Saturday stepped up a major hunt for a man who stabbed three people to death and wounded eight others at a street festival in the city of Solingen, authorities said.

title: Greta Thunberg, Activists Block Parts Of Norway Gas Plant In Protest
content: Protesters including Swedish activist Greta Thunberg and members of Extinction Rebellion on Saturday tried to blockade of a gas and oil processing plant in southwest Norway.
summary: Protesters including Swedish activist Greta Thunberg and members of Extinction Rebellion on Saturday tried to blockade of a gas and oil processing plant in southwest Norway.

title: NASA's Latest Update On Sunita Williams' Return: When And Where To Watch
content: Boeing's first crewed Starliner test flight, carrying NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore, has been stuck in space for the past two months.
summary: Boeing's first crewed Starliner test flight, carrying NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore, has been stuck in space for the past two months.

title: "She Loved Life": UK Billionaire's Daughter Dies In Sicily Yacht Wreck
content: British business tycoon Mike Lynch and his 18-year-old daughter Hannah Lynch were killed after their luxury yacht Bayesian sank during a storm off the coast of Sicily on Monday.
summary: British business tycoon Mike Lynch and his 18-year-old daughter Hannah Lynch were killed after their luxury yacht Bayesian sank during a storm off the coast of Sicily on Monday.

title: Italy Opens Manslaughter Inquiry In UK Tycoon Mike Lynch Yacht Sinking
content: An Italian prosecutor has opened a manslaughter investigation into the deaths of British tech magnate Mike Lynch and six other people who were killed when a luxury yacht sank off Sicily this week.
summary: An Italian prosecutor has opened a manslaughter investigation into the deaths of British tech magnate Mike Lynch and six other people who were killed when a luxury yacht sank off Sicily this week.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Delhi After Concluding His Visit To Poland, Ukraine
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived at Palam airport in Delhi today after concluding his two-nation visit to Poland and Ukraine.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived at Palam airport in Delhi today after concluding his two-nation visit to Poland and Ukraine.

title: Exclusive: Bangladesh Top Adviser On Growth, Minorities And Neighbourhood
content: Bangladesh is carrying out "fundamental, philosophical" reforms to bring back the country on the path of growth after living through years of entrenched corruption under the now ousted Awami League government.
summary: Bangladesh is carrying out "fundamental, philosophical" reforms to bring back the country on the path of growth after living through years of entrenched corruption under the now ousted Awami League government.

title: Kamala Harris Fails To Sway Pro-Palestine Critics, May Impact Presidential Bid
content: Disappointed Pro-Palestinian activists said Kamala Harris' speech to close the Democratic convention in Chicago failed to demonstrate any break from the status quo, after a week in which the most divisive issue facing the party was mostly ignored.
summary: Disappointed Pro-Palestinian activists said Kamala Harris' speech to close the Democratic convention in Chicago failed to demonstrate any break from the status quo, after a week in which the most divisive issue facing the party was mostly ignored.

content: Robert F Kennedy Jr said he would suspend his campaign and endorsed Republican Donald Trump.

title: "Progress Made" At Latest Round Of Gaza Truce Talks In Cairo, Says US
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited the Middle East this week and said Benjamin Netanyahu was on board with a US proposal to bridge gaps and reach a ceasefire.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited the Middle East this week and said Benjamin Netanyahu was on board with a US proposal to bridge gaps and reach a ceasefire.

title: Meth Worth Over $5 Million Found In Fake Watermelons At US-Mexico Border
content: US Customs and Border Protection (CBP) officers recently seized a truck carrying more than $5 million worth of methamphetamine at the US-Mexico border hidden inside a shipment of fake watermelons.
summary: US Customs and Border Protection (CBP) officers recently seized a truck carrying more than $5 million worth of methamphetamine at the US-Mexico border hidden inside a shipment of fake watermelons.

title: "They Hit Me All Over My Body": Israeli Woman Held Captive By Hamas
content: Noa Argamani, an Israeli woman who was abducted by Hamas on October 7, has said she was beaten and her hair was cut in captivity by Hamas.
summary: Noa Argamani, an Israeli woman who was abducted by Hamas on October 7, has said she was beaten and her hair was cut in captivity by Hamas.

title: Police Search For Assailant After 3 Killed In Germany Stabbing Incident
content: German police said on Saturday that they were still searching for an unknown assailant hours after he killed three people and wounded others in a stabbing attack at a festival in the western city of Solingen.
summary: German police said on Saturday that they were still searching for an unknown assailant hours after he killed three people and wounded others in a stabbing attack at a festival in the western city of Solingen.

title: "Don't Want To See Communist China Win", Says Ex-Trump Rival Nikki Haley
content: Nikki Haley, a former rival to Donald Trump for the US Republican presidential nomination, said on Saturday that isolationism was not healthy and that the party should stand with the country's allies, especially in the face of China.
summary: Nikki Haley, a former rival to Donald Trump for the US Republican presidential nomination, said on Saturday that isolationism was not healthy and that the party should stand with the country's allies, especially in the face of China.

title: Opinion: The Realism We Are Missing In Modi's Ukraine Trip
content: By maintaining its stance of strategic neutrality, India is securing self-interest-driven allies in Europe and Asia without the overlordship of the US.
summary: By maintaining its stance of strategic neutrality, India is securing self-interest-driven allies in Europe and Asia without the overlordship of the US.
